title: Matt Balasavage
summary: Matt Balasavage (born February 15, 1989) is a former American football tight end. He played until his senior year at Temple,  declared for the 2012 NFL Draft and was undrafted. He currently resides in Lancaster, Pa with his wife, Anna and their three children, Peyton, Luke and Emma.
content:
Matt Balasavage (born February 15, 1989) is a former American football tight end. He played until his senior year at Temple,  declared for the 2012 NFL Draft and was undrafted. He currently resides in Lancaster, Pa with his wife, Anna and their three children, Peyton, Luke and Emma.


== College career ==
He played college football at Temple University.


== Professional career ==


=== Baltimore Ravens ===
After going undrafted, he signed with the Baltimore Ravens. On August 31, 2012, he was placed on Injured Reserve due to an ankle injury. On September 4, 2012, he was released with an injury settlement.
